title: S3cco
author: S3cco
content: Future of Fintech | 1-2 March 2023 | Riyadh, Saudi ArabiaEvent Website: https://nispanaglobal.com/fof/The 3rd edition Future of Fintech is an exclusive hybrid event that will pave the way for disruption in the ﬁnancial technology space in the region & unravel the potential of transforming ﬁnancial services, which will eventually shape business models, enterprises, and customer experience and herald a strong digital economy. This high-level summit will be covering the entire fintech ecosystem with 350+ in-person vaccinated participants and 500+ virtual participants. This exclusive summit will provide a very special opportunity for the entire fintechs, banks, regulators, financial institutions, technology companies, BNPLs, capital markets, insurance companies, VC funds, investors and start-ups to showcase their products, services, and revolutionizing technology solutions to the high-level stakeholders in KSA.
